feed.title: Streamystats Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Streamystats: v0.2.0
entry.content:
What's new

  • List all items with watch stats. Great for identifying unwatched items.
  • More robust import and sync.

entry.title: New release for Streamystats: v1.0.0
entry.content:
This breaking-change release removes the dependency on the Playback Reporting Plugin. Streamystats now calculates the play duration based on sessions directly from the Jellyfin API.

What's Changed

  • Use Sessions Instead of Playback Reporting Plugin
  • Image thumbnails on dashboard and library view
  • Better filtering on exact date (in graph) and type (in library)
  • Improved sync
  • Better handling of very long titles (+255 chars) and other fields

entry.title: New release for Streamystats: v1.1.0
entry.content:
This release introduces a Jellystat activity data import function, active sessions on the dashboard and some bug fixes!

What's Changed

  • feat: arm build by @fredrikburmester in https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamystats/pull/8
  • feat: show active sessions on dashboard by @fredrikburmester in https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamystats/pull/10
  • feat: import data from jellystat by @fredrikburmester in https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamystats/pull/12
  • feat: most watched series on dashboard
  • feat: more info columns in history table
  • fix: use node instead of bun (solving issues on synology-type servers)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamystats/compare/v1.0.0...v1.1.0

entry.title: New release for Streamystats: v1.2.0
entry.content:
What's changed

  • feat: new library select dropdown in library items table
  • fix: history is now properly scoped for each user (admin can still see all history)
  • feat: history tables are now properly paginated
  • fix: try to sanitize names to avoid db errors (we still have some work to do on import errors)
  • fix: active sessions no longer changing order on each update

Future plans:

  • Only sync data from certain libraries feature
  • Better import stability
  • Improve graphs

entry.title: New release for Streamystats: v1.3.0
entry.content:
This release has a couple of fixes with routing and privileges, and introduces item specific statistics through an API route (per request https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamystats/issues/28). A view/page will come later.

What's Changed

  • feat: item specific statistics + api endpoint for items by @fredrikburmester in https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamystats/pull/29
  • fix: add error boundary to page
  • fix: only admin should be able to see sessions
  • fix: improve jellystat import by allowing (and renaming) nil name to Untitled Item

Full Changelog: https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamystats/compare/v1.2.0...v1.3.0
